(OOC: Birthday of NBW? Cool! *Opens up big bottle after shaking it and it
starts spraying everywhere* Ack! Stop it! NOOO! The rug! The sofa! NOOO!
Someone help or it will never stop! Oh no! *Reads micro scopic warning on
the bottom of the cork and the bottom of the cork was on the inside of the
bottle! with a microscope. It says: "WARNING: Don't shake before opening!
This is an never ending bottle!" NOOOOO! THE HORROR! Someone stop it!
Someone drink it!)

From: <logomorph@...>

Sent: Thursday, August 31, 2000 9:30 AM
Subject: Re: Happy Birthday Neo Beast wars RPG!


>
> HAPPY ANIVERSARY ALL!!
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> >     If you dont know, today is our one year anniversary. This day,
> in 1999,
> > we began the epic story of the Neo Beasts Wars. Over time we have
> lost
> > members, banished members, and gained members. Lets hope that this
> RPG will
> > continue onward and get even more successful. As for the standout
> players, we
> > will be giving out awards in the near future when we get around to
> analyze
> > some posts. In the meantime, keep up the RPing!
> > -JP
